title: Bleed with Style
description: Elohim is a rebellious teen. He does well in his studies, there was no disputing that, but he finds them far too easy and so he looks for other things to occupy his mind. Things like sneaking out and finding trouble – BIG trouble. His sister can’t always be there to cover his back but she tries.One night he goes too far and the punishment is unexpected – life can be tough when you’re a vampire...
author: Glenn Scrimshaw
